basics.name: Prabhudayal Vaishnav
basics.label: Undergraduate Student
basics.summary: A Software Engineer with proficiency in Python. Have an interest in Large Language Models (LLMs) and Artificial Intelligence (AI). Constantly learning and Growing with the help of Projects.

education.institution: Chhattisgarh Swami Vivekanand Technical University, Bhilai, India

awards.title: Indian Institute of Management Hackathon Winner 2024
awards.summary: Data Analyst Hackathon organized by IIM-Nagpur’s incubation center InFED. Automated the report generation of 22 pages by using my Python based AI Agent.

publications.name: Comparative Performance Analysis Of Major Language Models In The Market
publications.summary: It details a comprehensive analysis of the performance of major large language models (LLMs) such as Gemini, ChatGPT, Meta AI, Perplexity, and Claude. The analysis evaluates these models across several key dimensions, including their abilities in multitask language understanding, question answering, mathematical reasoning, and tool usage.

publications.name: Exploring Style Transfer With Small Character-level Transformers: A Case Study On Shakespearean And Modern Texts
publications.summary: This paper presents a novel approach to style transfer using small character-level transformers, focusing on the conversion of text between Shakespearean and modern writing styles. Style transfer is a critical task in natural language processing (NLP) and creative writing, enabling the adaptation of text to fit specific contexts or audiences. This is particularly relevant in content generation, where the ability to generate text in different styles can enhance the versatility and engagement of the content.

projects.name: The AI Scientist
projects.summary: Contributed to Sakana AI’s open-source project to automate research paper generation. Integrated Open-Sourced Language Models to develop an AI Scientist capable of generating research papers. Generated a paper titled 'EXPLORING STYLE TRANSFER WITH SMALL CHARACTER-LEVEL TRANSFORMERS' entirely by utilizing the free resources.

projects.name: Remote Shell Access Bot: XAdmin
projects.summary: Python-based program enabling reverse shell connections without having the login credentials via Telegram API. A Python-based bot that turns your Telegram into a secure command center for your PC.

projects.name: Created Python Module: XS
projects.summary: Creates Endpoint URL for Open-Sourced LLMs running onto any Cloud Instance like Google Colab. Developed and published Python package for creating Endpoint URLs for LLMs.

projects.name: An AI Powered Telegram Bot: XGen-AI
projects.summary: A Telegram bot with RAG capabilities using Meta Llama 3.1. It supports document-based chat Q&A alongside the intelligence of an advanced language model.

projects.name: E-Commerce Website: MetroCart
projects.summary: A minimalist and elegant e-commerce website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Focused on providing a superior and minimalist user experience.
